Something sinister watches from nearby, four on two seemed fair, especially
when one was already sniffing the Nebulan fuel. a hand went up directing a
second, the second signaled the third, and then the fourth. insectlike wings
spread from the leader and silently rose him above the others. the three on
the ground now had a triangle formation around thier prey while the leader
rose above them preventing any airborn escape.

the one who'd circled behind transformed to something similar to a double
barrled tank with hoverwheels in the front and three sets of spiked treads
in the back. four missles on each side of the dome on top readied for launch
should the two fight in this direction.

(Since this is Cybertron this will probably be thier only appearance in this
story.)

THE CYBRATS- young impetuous transformers with a streetgang mentality and a
youthfull immaturity who roam the back alleys of Cybertron looking for
victims to steal credits and energeon from.

Members
Switchblade- Leader and organizer of thier attacks. transforms into a
cybertronic VTOL similar to a front half of a helecopter with buglike
flapping wings instead of a propeller.

Arty- muscular bot packing heavy artillary. transforms into tanklike object
described above.

Branding- the female flamethrower- transforms to a rectangular futuristic
truck with a back capable of being used as a blast furnace.

Dogged- feral minded tooth and claw barbarian of the team, his idea of a
good time is bite first and ask questions later,. transforms to four treaded
terrain vehicle about the size of a snowmobile.


----- Original Message -----
From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2001 10:41 PM
Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....


> ::Repugnus::
> Repugnus watched the bot stumble by.
> "You dare...you dare to just walk by me without addressing....How doare
> you exhaust pipe. " He said.
> He thought of using his pincers to send and distort colors, but thr
> drunk bot would probably have no affect to it already.  He rand at the
> bot trying to pin him against the wall with his pincer.
>
